data.title: Metal ion-aromatic complexes. VII. Crystal and molecular structure of bis(m-xylene)silver perchlorate

questions.question: What is the title of the article that discusses the crystal and molecular structure of bis(m-xylene)silver perchlorate?
questions.answer: Metal ion-aromatic complexes. VII. Crystal and molecular structure of bis(m-xylene)silver perchlorate

questions.question: Who are the authors of the study on bis(m-xylene)silver perchlorate's crystal and molecular structure?
questions.answer: I. F. Taylor Jr., E. A. Hall, E. L. Amma

questions.question: In which journal was the study on bis(m-xylene)silver perchlorate published?
questions.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society
